title: Moto G52 lands in India with a pOLED 90Hz display, Snapdragon 680 SoC, and a 5,000mAh battery
content:
After launching the aggressively-priced Moto G22 in India earlier this month, Motorola is back again with a new budget smartphone as it seeks to capture a bigger slice of the Indian smartphone market. Today, the Lenovo-owned company officially unveiled the Moto G52 in the country, offering a solid hardware package at a competitive price. Moto

The post Moto G52 lands in India with a pOLED 90Hz display, Snapdragon 680 SoC, and a 5,000mAh battery appeared first on XDA.
description: Motorola has officially launched the Moto G52 in India. The latest budget smartphone offers a pOLED display, Snapdragon 680 and more.
